original: unfold sign. unfold sign at 1. destruct (total_order_T 0 (- x)) as [[H1|H1]|H1]. - rewrite (Ropp_eq_compat _ _ (proj1 (Rlt_0_1) (proj1 (Rlt_gt 0) H1))). rewrite (Ropp_eq_compat _ _ (proj1 (Rlt_0_1) (proj1 (Rlt_gt 0) H1))). reflexivity. - rewrite H1. reflexivity. - rewrite (Ropp_eq_compat _ _ (proj2 (proj2 H1))). reflexivity.
